parameters.IQfoster: IQ of twin raised by foster parents
parameters.IQbio: IQ of twin raised by biological parents

description:
Description
The Burt data frame has 27 rows and 4 columns.
The “data” were simply (and notoriously) manufactured.  The
same data are in the dataset “twins" in the alr3
package, but with different labels.
title: Fraudulent Data on IQs of Twins Raised Apart
reference:
Burt, C. (1966) 
The genetic determination of differences in intelligence: 
A study of monozygotic twins reared together and apart. 
British Journal of Psychology 57, 137–153.
format: This data frame contains the following columns:
